rules_text:
Put three +1/+1 counters on target land. It becomes a 0/0 colorless Elemental creature with haste that’s still a land.
Orchestrate–Sacrifice a land. [i](You may exile this card from your hand anytime you could cast a sorcery for its orchestrate cost. When you next resolve a spell, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
